programme.title: Quantum Voyage
programme.desc: Mattie Carver experiences auditory and visual hallucinations as she witnesses the collapse of space and time.

programme.title: Delta Space Mission
programme.desc: In the year 3084, an advanced spaceship called Delta is created to establish dialogue between intergalactic civilizations. Soon after an alien journalist boards the ship, she and the captain realize the AI that controls the ship can act on its own.

programme.title: Bloody Bites
programme.desc: A compilation of snack-sized horror films to disturb genre fans across the world.

programme.title: Bloody Bites

programme.title: The Man Called Noon
programme.desc: An outlaw (Stephen Boyd) and a woman (Rosanna Schiaffino) help an amnesiac gunfighter (Richard Crenna) on a quest for identity, gold and revenge.

programme.title: The Grand Duel
programme.desc: A mysterious gunfighter (Lee Van Cleef) protects a man accused of killing an Arizona big shot.

programme.title: Faster Blade: Poisonous Darts
programme.desc: Rival gangs pursue a noble thief.

programme.title: The Chinese Connection
programme.desc: In turn-of-the-century China, a martial-arts student declares war against the rival fighters who murdered his mentor.

programme.title: Bruce Lee the Invincible
programme.desc: A kung-fu student (Bruce Li) tries to find a wayward classmate after he joins a group of militarists.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: In a near future industrial wasteland dominated by powerful corporations, a convict is given a second chance at freedom. In exchange for a full pardon, he must help a team of corporate thieves steal prototype technology from a rival company.

programme.title: Robowar
programme.desc: A team of commandos heads into the jungles of Venezuela on a highly classified mission and encounters a robotic killing machine.

programme.title: The Fearless Hyena
programme.desc: An old master's grandson learns the style called emotional kung fu.

programme.title: Fearless Hyena II
programme.desc: A member (Jackie Chan) of the Yin-Yang clan fights a Ching dynasty gang known as Heaven and Earth.

programme.title: The Switchblade Sisters
programme.desc: The leader (Robbie Lee) of an all-girl gang feels threatened by a tough new member (Joanne Nail).
